Text:
is this supposed to be funny? "documentary". it doesn't have anything to do with critical approach, rather it confirms its own prejudice. a journalistic catastrophe. if you are interested in establishment criticism then check out www.chomskytorrents.org or simply do a search for real documentaries like "the corporation" or "manufacturing consent" alternatively check out Noam Chomsky's blog: http://blog.zmag.org/bloggers/?blogger=chomsky

If you are looking for a laugh, check out your local park. i think the circus season is coming up.
